Articles.Content:
I have loaded this in so many ways but still can not get it to load. I'm running a Intel core (TM) 477k [email protected] GHz with 32.0GB memory with 31.8 usable I usually do not have a memory freeze problem unless.\, I go to one of my very large ships. than they still load after 30 seconds . I have uninstalled the game and reinstalled and just tried to run with nothing but the EVE and nothing. these are the mods I have installed and have no problem with any running, all are up to date except planet shine. although I may have missed on or two. https://1drv.ms/i/s!AneT8Vt1fAkahAhxMtbMI4QnWPqK I'm also including the output log https://1drv.ms/t/s!AneT8Vt1fAkahAl6mBasVqQ8o-nL

Edited September 30, 2017 by flekota
missed something
